name: Simple Caprese Salad
author: stronglive1
summary: Traditional appetizer, but also makes a great main dish on a hot summer day.  Feel free to add cooked eggplant and/or zucchini slices to this dish to make it heartier.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained
1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained  (Optional)
directions: Cut roasted red peppers into 16 large pieces
Starting at the edge of a serving platter, place a slice of tomato, a basil leaf, a slice of mozzarella cheese, a piece of roasted pepper, and another basil leaf
Continue in that pattern, forming a spiral from the outside in, until all the ingredients have been arranged; salad should end in the center of the platter
Drizzle the salad with olive oil and sprinkle with black pepper and black olives
